text: 'Eslamshahr and Suburbs Bus Organization (') is a public transport agency running Transit buses in Eslamshahr County's localities and connects them to Tehran and its Metro System. There are 3 special routes in the system (), these routes only have stops in the neighbourhood they start their route from. ==List of Routes== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ |colspan="7" | 750px |- |-bgcolor=#ACE1AF !Colour !Name !Length (km) !Fare(Rials) !Connections |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#ED1C24" | |Eslamshahr (Qa'em Sq.)-Azadi |27 |4250 |x20pxx15px Azadegan Metro Station x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#3F48CC" | | Eslamshahr (Namaz Sq.)-Shahed |27 |4250 |x20pxx15px Shahed Metro Station |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#00A2E8" | | Mahdieh-Azari |22 |3750 |x20pxx15px Azadegan Metro Station |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#FFAEC9" | | Qa'emieh- Azari |24.5 |3750 |x20pxx15px Azadegan Metro Station |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#22B14C" | | Ahamadabad-e Mostowfi-Azadi |24.5 |4000 |x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#A349A4" | | Firuz Bahram-Azadi |24 |3500 |x20pxx15px Azadegan Metro Station x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#FF0080" | | Eslamshahr (Namaz Sq.)-Aderan |16.5 |3500 | |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#408080" | | Eslamshahr Azad Uni. (Namaz Sq.)- Chichaklu Azad Uni. |8 |3000 | |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#000080" | | Vavan-Azadi (Special) |31.5 |5000 |x20pxx15px Azadegan Metro Station x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#800040" | | Vavan-Shahed (Special) |21.5 |5000 |x20pxx15px Shahed Metro Station |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#B97A57" | | Shahrak-e Emam Hosein-Azadi (Special) |25 |4500 |x20pxx15px Azadegan Metro Station x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |} == References== Category:Transport in Iran Category:Eslamshahr County Category:Bus transport in Iran
